meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Corbett Adrian Goldstein Barton Wong Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7948.

td.p: Sam Corbett, an assistant office manager from New York, New York
Adrian Goldstein, a technical writer from Oakland, California
Barton Wong, a senior trading associate from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,200)

tr.td: THE DRY TORTUGAS
NOTABLE WOMEN
CHILDREN'S LIT
ARCHITECTURE TERMS
"PH" ≠ F
(Alex: In each correct response, the letters "PH" will come up, but not with the "F" sound. All right?)
HOLLYWOOD MEMORABILIA
(Sarah: From the archives of auction house Profiles in History.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1976 Florida\'s Dry Tortugas were paired with these vast wetlands as a UNESCO biosphere reserve')

tr.td: In 1976 Florida's Dry Tortugas were paired with these vast wetlands as a UNESCO biosphere reserve

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
